content: How in God’s name did these privileged, older, white men come up with enough nerve to call themselves the “Freedom Caucus” and then having the utter balls to make their membership a secret! There are 2 lines from the movie “Network” (1976) that have always stuck with me. We should be gather ourselves together and carrying placards down the halls of Congress to protest their little boys’ clubish health care ideas and obvious misogynistic attempts at passing these bills in the attempt to continue their war on women! The 1st one is — “I’m a human being, god-dammit! My life has value!” and the second one would be when the newscaster Howard Beale (played by Peter Finch)— Beale hung his head out of the network window “ I’M AS MAD AS HELL, AND I’M NOT GOING TO TAKE THIS ANYMORE!”.
